Flow.description: DR - 6/24/24 - Replaced by outbound comm records
Flow.label: DEPRECATED Error on File

textTemplates.name: BridgeLegal_Email
textTemplates.text:
Meghan,

An error has been identified in the case of for the {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case, marked as an "error on file" in our system.

The error reason is: replace this
Contact Information: {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c}{!$Record.litify_pm__Last_Name__c} {!$Record.litify_pm__Phone__c} {!$Record.FX_Client_Email__c} DOB: {!$Record.litify_pm__Client__r.Date_of_Birth_Text__c} Lead ID: {!$Record.Id}

Your prompt action in resolving this matter is greatly appreciated. You have 7 days to complete this request before a final notification will be sent.

Best Regards,
Saddle Rock Legal Group
888-686-6454
